movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.synopsis: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

characters.name: Paul Atreides
characters.description: The prophesied leader of the Fremen rebellion

characters.name: Chani
characters.description: Fremen warrior and Paul's love interest

movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.synopsis: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

characters.name: J. Robert Oppenheimer
characters.description: Theoretical physicist and father of the atomic bomb

characters.name: Kitty Oppenheimer
characters.description: Robert's wife and former Communist Party member

characters.name: Leslie Groves
characters.description: U.S. Army Corps of Engineers officer

characters.name: Lewis Strauss
characters.description: Chairman of the U.S. Atomic Energy Commission
